documentation.text:
@notice The donationTracker mapping format is as follows:
 {total donation number for the user}-{donator address without leading 0x}
 So, for example, if the first donation that this contract receives
 is from address 0xA7a5F8EA98C9b345075dDa7442A833189Ce3717e, the 
 donationTracker mapping entry will look like this:
 1 => 1-a7a5f8ea98c9b345075dda7442a833189ce3717e
 Note how the address is converted to lower case.

function (struct Counters.Counter storage pointer) view returns (uint256)

getExpendedDonationIDForDonation(address.details: Returns an ID (uint256) to be used to get a value from the expendedDonations mapping

getExpendedDonationIDForExpenditure(uint.details: Returns an ID (uint256) to be used to get a value from the expendedDonations mapping

params._string: A string for which to check whether it is empty

returns._0: a boolean value that expresses whether the string is empty

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

donationTracker(uint256).notice: The donationTracker mapping format is as follows: {total donation number for the user}-{donator address without leading 0x} So, for example, if the first donation that this contract receives is from address 0xA7a5F8EA98C9b345075dDa7442A833189Ce3717e, the  donationTracker mapping entry will look like this: 1 => 1-a7a5f8ea98c9b345075dda7442a833189ce3717e Note how the address is converted to lower case.

isTextEmpty(string).notice: Check to see if a string is empty
